entry.title: Aligning Sales & Marketing with Intercom (podcast)
entry.content: Excellent listen or read on how sales and marketing can collaborate to create a joint “revenue plan.” Featuring Intercom’s Bryan Kotlyar and Jeff Serlin.
entry.summary: Excellent listen or read on how sales and marketing can collaborate to create a joint “revenue plan.” Featuring Intercom’s Bryan Kotlyar and Jeff Serlin.

entry.title: Advanced Tactics for Dynamic Search Ads

link.title: Advanced Tactics for Dynamic Search Ads

entry.content: Dynamic Search Ads are something I’ve been utilizing more regularly, specifically in conjuction with remarketing audiences. This article gives a good introduction to some other targeting options.
entry.summary: Dynamic Search Ads are something I’ve been utilizing more regularly, specifically in conjuction with remarketing audiences. This article gives a good introduction to some other targeting options.

entry.title: Google’s Medic Update&#58 How to fix your website if you were hit

link.title: Google's Medic Update&#58 How to fix your website if you were hit

entry.content: One of the better recovery guides for the August 2018 algo update named “Medic”. If you’re seeing drops some time around there, check this one out.
entry.summary: One of the better recovery guides for the August 2018 algo update named “Medic”. If you’re seeing drops some time around there, check this one out.

entry.title: How to Start a Blog in The Most Cluttered Marketplace In History

link.title: How to Start a Blog in The Most Cluttered Marketplace In History

entry.content: Content Strategy: what you should write about, how often, and where. Applicable for individual bloggers and organizations looking to implement a content strategy.
entry.summary: Content Strategy: what you should write about, how often, and where. Applicable for individual bloggers and organizations looking to implement a content strategy.

entry.title: Manage Multiple Mailchimp Accounts with One Login

link.title: Manage Multiple Mailchimp Accounts with One Login

entry.content: An issue that plagues digital marketing agencies that use MailChimp but don’t have it set up.
entry.summary: An issue that plagues digital marketing agencies that use MailChimp but don’t have it set up.

entry.title: 119 Examples of 10X Content (by Rand Fishkin)
entry.content: Good content should be 10X better than the rest. Here’s Rand Fishkin’s big ol’ list of examples of good content.
entry.summary: Good content should be 10X better than the rest. Here’s Rand Fishkin’s big ol’ list of examples of good content.

entry.title: On-page SEO for Natural Language Processing (NLP)

link.title: On-page SEO for Natural Language Processing (NLP)

entry.content: How to use Google’s Cloud Natural Language platform to optimize your on-page SEO for machine-readable content.
entry.summary: How to use Google’s Cloud Natural Language platform to optimize your on-page SEO for machine-readable content.

entry.title: Script&#58 A time-saving free script to help keep Ad Grants accounts out of trouble

link.title: Script&#58 A time-saving free script to help keep Ad Grants accounts out of trouble

entry.content: Fred from Optmyzr has a whole host of scripts he encourages Optmyzr’s clients to use. Here’s a freebie for those who are working with Ad Grants Accounts.
entry.summary: Fred from Optmyzr has a whole host of scripts he encourages Optmyzr’s clients to use. Here’s a freebie for those who are working with Ad Grants Accounts.
